Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2015 11:00AM - edited Feb 24, 2015 11:02AM by snowy I am 43 and was diagnosed with atypical lobular hyperplasia in 2012 they want me on tomoxifen but I can't bring myself to take it. I take all the supplements as you and more like ip-6 gold,calcium d-glucarate etc. I have had thermography,mri and ultrasounds and thank God all clear so far. Do you take tomoxifen and are you still cancer free. Thank you for sharing.
Posts.Title: Atypia Hyperplasia-Now What? mkd1061 Petitegal127
